title: [Control Systems] Moxa security advisory (AV25-122)
description: On March 6, 2025, Moxa published a security advisory to address a critical vulnerability in the following products:
products: PT-508 Series   firmware version 3.8 and prior
PT-510 Series   firmware version 3.8 and prior
PT-7528 Series   firmware version 5.0 and prior
PT-7728 Series   firmware version 3.9 and prior
PT-7828 Series   firmware version 4.0 and prior
PT-G503 Series   firmware version 5.3 and prior
PT-G510 Series   firmware version 6.5 and prior
PT-G7728 Series   firmware version 6.5 and prior
PT-G7828 Series   firmware version 6.5 and prior
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
